channel.title: Journal on Andre Kuhlenschmidt
channel.description: Recent content in Journal on Andre Kuhlenschmidt

item.title: Focusing on Work
item.description: As part of my continued struggle to improve myself I have decided to sign up for a coaching program that the Kelley School of Business funds. I met with my coach for the first time last night, and many of the things we talked about were challenging. Hopefully this document helps me stay on track with my goals for the day and can serve as a starting place for the rest of the week.

item.title: New Goals!
item.description: I am starting to work with a career coach, continuing to loose weight, and starting new financial goals.

item.title: A Summary of my February
item.description: This last month was really hard. I got a paper rejected from a PLDI after getting really good reviews; My grandfather (fondly referred to as old man) passed on after spending the last 3 months of his life trapped in a nursing home; and I didn’t get the internship that I applied for. Despite, all of this the last month has made me really hopeful. I have successfully lost 12ish pounds this year, maintained a reasonable exercise routine, taken over the majority of the cooking/shopping from my wife, and how found the energy to decide that I want to learn Japanese despite the fact that I really don’t have the time.
